scripts.publish: git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm run publish
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm run publish
scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm run publish
scripts.setup:
npm install svgexport -g && wget -nv -O- https://download.calibre-ebook.com/linux-installer.py | python -c "import sys; main=lambda x,y:sys.stderr.write('Download failed
'); exec(sys.stdin.read()); main('~/calibre-bin', True)"
scripts.netlify: npm run setup && npm run build && npm run build:pdf
